data.text: Fizɔgɛ ɓulu ɓuɠa vɔɔ goi ɠɛ nu ya, è ɗa mi ziilɛigi zu,
Botiɠɛ nui é ga ɠima nui, naa ɠa ɗa zei doun zunui unda, nii é ɓaaɠulama vai ɠɛɛzu.
Wali ɠaei ta zanugi, ti ɠaa ɠa ɗa wuun ga abui, ma nɔɠɔi ʋa ɠula ba,
Zɔi é faa ɲɔi ɠɛɛzu, toɠa ɗa woilo faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti goo ma,
Ɗa ɲɛɛɠulana bala nui zu, Kpɛtɛ Nui ɠa è unfesu,
Nu wɔlɔiti ta-lɛbiya wɔɔlɔgi ɠa é ga ti-lounlointi,
Nu woozuɠɛzɛi la zolooni faaɠaaɠalala nui ma,
Tanigaa ta ɗa ɠisiɛ ga, lobɛanii ɠa ɠɛ ti ʋɛ ga undaanɛɛi,
Zɔi é pɔ é nɛɛ nuiti bɛ, naa ɠa ɗa tɔ koloɠologiti suvaayɛ, niiti ti ɠɛai la,
Zeliloma ɠilagi ɠa ɗa faa ʋaa keleɠele nui ma,
Nu ɲɔi ɠa ɗa buzeɠe daalɔɠɔma vai nɔ ɠaiziɛ,
Nu ɠomi ga filɛ zua leei, nii ná-ziʋoiti kulaai zea,
Ni nu a faa ʋagɔi zalana ga faa ɲɔi,
Sakpegi lɔɔzei, naa ɠa é ga è ziɛi luɠɔlosuʋɛ laavie,
Nii é losu faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ʋolu, ta zɔi é telebo nui ʋeelalazu,
Walii a ɠɛna ɠimalala nui ya, leeni ɠa a kɛ la?
Bɔɔla nui ɠa ɗa nɛɛbɛi ɠɛ yeenɔpɛ.
Kɛni nui balagai ɠigi ma, naa ɠa a ɗa minazeɠe,
Nui kpɔɛba vai nɛai bɛ, tɔ koloɠologi nɛɛʋɛ bɛ.
Nui yaavai ziimaʋɛ, é la undaanɛ zɔlɔɔga,
Zɔi é faaɠaaɠalala loun zunui zɔlɔɔsu, ziizoolɛi ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ma.
Ziilaai ɠa ga kɛdɛya zaɓu wola,
Yaava nui ɠa ɗa lobɛanii zo, ti dɔɔɠu seɠei wu,
Ɠimalai maaɓuɠaʋɛ keleɠele nui ʋa,
Faaɠaaɠalala loun zunui kɛɛɠɛ ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ziiɓɔlɔi zu,
É la zolooni, nu ʋa fuun gani ɠula sɔbalala nui ya,
Nui nii é ziaa faa mɔinmɔin su, naa ɠa ɗa dama, é mina ɓɔɛ ga gola,
Ɠimalala nui ɓalaa a ɗa leve ga ɠima nu, ni toɠa zoo maaɠɛsu kpɔ.
